metadata.synopsis: Party Banter for Laezel and Gale in the Illithid Colony (Tadpoling Center)

0.speaker: Lae'zel
0.text: A tadpole nursery, as on the nautiloid. We must not leave it intact.

2.speaker: Gale
2.text: Quite right. So long as the attempt won't leave us similarly dismantled...
2.context: NodeContext: Slightly apprehensive, not sure what Lae'zel is planning

1.speaker: Lae'zel
1.text: Caution is commendable. Boldness is extraordinary. In this case, I recommend the latter.
